original: 天下大定後，東西二帝並存，豫、青、徐、幽屬吳；兗、冀、並、涼歸蜀。司州以函谷關為界分屬兩國。
text: After the Great Ding of the World, the two emperors of the East and the West co-existed, Yu, Qing, Xu, and You belonged to Wu; Yan, Ji, He, and Liang returned to Shu. Sizhou is divided into two countries with Hangu Pass as the boundary.
